verses.verse: מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יָּפ֧וּ <S%H3303><s%> beautiful פְעָמַ֛יִךְ <S%H6471><s%> are thy feet בַּנְּעָלִ֖ים <S%H5275><s%> with shoes בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter נָדִ֑יב <S%H5081><s%> O prince's חַמּוּקֵ֣י <S%H2542><s%> the joints יְרֵכַ֔יִךְ <S%H3409><s%> of thy thighs כְּמ֣וֹ <S%H3644><s%> are like חֲלָאִ֔ים <S%H2481><s%> [are] like jewels מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> of the hands אָמָּֽן׃ <S%H542><s%> of a cunning workman

שָׁרְרֵךְ֙ <S%H8326><s%> Thy navel אַגַּ֣ן <S%H101><s%> goblet הַסַּ֔הַר <S%H5469><s%> [is like] a round אַל־ <S%H408><s%> never יֶחְסַ֖ר <S%H2637><s%> [which] wanteth הַמָּ֑זֶג <S%H4197><s%> not liquor בִּטְנֵךְ֙ <S%H990><s%> thy belly עֲרֵמַ֣ת <S%H6194><s%> [is like] an heap חִטִּ֔ים <S%H2406><s%> of wheat סוּגָ֖ה <S%H5473><s%> set about בַּשּׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <S%H7799><s%> with lilies

שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> Thy two שָׁדַ֛יִךְ <S%H7699><s%> breasts כִּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> [are] like two עֳפָרִ֖ים <S%H6082><s%> young תָּאֳמֵ֥י <S%H8380><s%> [that are] twins צְבִיָּֽה׃ <S%H6646><s%> roes

צַוָּארֵ֖ךְ <S%H6677><s%> Thy neck כְּמִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H4026><s%> [is] as a tower הַשֵּׁ֑ן <S%H8127><s%> of ivory עֵינַ֜יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> thine eyes בְּרֵכ֣וֹת <S%H1295><s%> [like] the fishpools בְּחֶשְׁבּ֗וֹן <S%H2809><s%> in Heshbon עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> By שַׁ֙עַר֙ <S%H8179><s%> by the gate בַּת־ רַבִּ֔ים <S%H1337><s%> of Bathrabbim אַפֵּךְ֙ <S%H639><s%> thy nose כְּמִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H4026><s%> [is] as the tower הַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon צוֹפֶ֖ה <S%H6822><s%> which looketh פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> toward דַמָּֽשֶׂק׃ <S%H1834><s%> Damascus

רֹאשֵׁ֤ךְ <S%H7218><s%> Thine head עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H5921><s%> crowns כַּכַּרְמֶ֔ל <S%H3760><s%> upon thee [is] like Carmel וְדַלַּ֥ת <S%H1803><s%> and the hair רֹאשֵׁ֖ךְ <S%H7218><s%> of thine head כָּאַרְגָּמָ֑ן <S%H713><s%> like purple מֶ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אָס֥וּר <S%H631><s%> [is] held בָּרְהָטִֽים׃ <S%H7298><s%> in the galleries

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יָּפִית֙ <S%H3302><s%> How fair וּמַה־ <S%H4100><s%> and how נָּעַ֔מְתְּ <S%H5276><s%> and how pleasant אַהֲבָ֖ה <S%H160><s%> art thou O love בַּתַּֽעֲנוּגִֽים׃ <S%H8588><s%> for delights

זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise קֽוֹמָתֵךְ֙ <S%H6967><s%> This thy stature דָּֽמְתָ֣ה <S%H1819><s%> is like לְתָמָ֔ר <S%H8558><s%> to a palm tree וְשָׁדַ֖יִךְ <S%H7699><s%> and thy breasts לְאַשְׁכֹּלֽוֹת׃ <S%H811><s%> to clusters

אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> I said אֶעֱלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> I will go up בְתָמָ֔ר <S%H8558><s%> to the palm tree אֹֽחֲזָ֖ה <S%H270><s%> I will take hold בְּסַנְסִנָּ֑יו <S%H5577><s%> of the boughs וְיִֽהְיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> may שָׁדַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H7699><s%> thereof now also thy breasts כְּאֶשְׁכְּל֣וֹת <S%H811><s%> shall be as clusters הַגֶּ֔פֶן <S%H1612><s%> of the vine וְרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> and the smell אַפֵּ֖ךְ <S%H639><s%> of thy nose כַּתַּפּוּחִֽים׃ <S%H8598><s%> like apples

וְחִכֵּ֕ךְ <S%H2441><s%> And the roof of thy mouth כְּיֵ֥ין <S%H3196><s%> wine הַטּ֛וֹב <S%H2896><s%> like the best הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> that goeth לְדוֹדִ֖י <S%H1730><s%> for my beloved לְמֵישָׁרִ֑ים <S%H4339><s%> [down] sweetly דּוֹבֵ֖ב <S%H1680><s%> to speak שִׂפְתֵ֥י <S%H8193><s%> causing the lips יְשֵׁנִֽים׃ <S%H3462><s%> grow old
אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> I am לְדוֹדִ֔י <S%H1730><s%> I [am] my beloved's וְעָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> and תְּשׁוּקָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H8669><s%> and his desire ס

לְכָ֤ה <S%H1980><s%> Come דוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> my beloved נֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> let us go forth הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> into the field נָלִ֖ינָה <S%H3885><s%> let us lodge בַּכְּפָרִֽים׃ <S%H3723><s%> in the villages

נַשְׁכִּ֙ימָה֙ <S%H7925><s%> Let us get up early לַכְּרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> to the vineyards נִרְאֶ֞ה <S%H7200><s%> let us see אִם <S%H518><s%> whether פָּֽרְחָ֤ה <S%H6524><s%> flourish הַגֶּ֙פֶן֙ <S%H1612><s%> if the vine פִּתַּ֣ח <S%H6605><s%> appear הַסְּמָדַ֔ר <S%H5563><s%> [whether] the tender grape הֵנֵ֖צוּ <S%H5132><s%> bud forth הָרִמּוֹנִ֑ים <S%H7416><s%> [and] the pomegranates שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> There אֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> there will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דֹּדַ֖י <S%H1730><s%> thee my loves

לָֽךְ׃ הַֽדּוּדָאִ֣ים <S%H1736><s%> The mandrakes נָֽתְנוּ־ <S%H5414><s%> give רֵ֗יחַ <S%H7381><s%> a smell וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over פְּתָחֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H6607><s%> and at our gates כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> are all מְגָדִ֔ים <S%H4022><s%> [are] all manner of pleasant חֲדָשִׁ֖ים <S%H2319><s%> [fruits] new גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> again יְשָׁנִ֑ים <S%H3465><s%> and old דּוֹדִ֖י <S%H1730><s%> for thee O my beloved צָפַ֥נְתִּי <S%H6845><s%> [which] I have laid up לָֽךְ׃
